27 sekundmeter snö (2005) (TV)

Directed by
Tobias Falk

Writing credits
Kjerstin Göransson-Ljungman (novel)
Lovisa Milles (screenplay)
Add to MyMovies Photo Gallery IMDbPro Details

Genre: Crime / Drama / Mystery / Thriller

Plot Summary: In 1939 ten people on an outing are caught in a mountain cabin during a snow storm together with the cabin's hostess... (more)

User Rating: 5.3/10 (31 votes)

Credited cast:
Jacob Ericksson .... Sven Nilsson
Anders Ahlbom .... Wiesmann (as Anders Ahlbom Rosendahl)
Mylaine Hedreul .... Ninnan

Gunilla Abrahamsson .... Frida
Livia Millhagen .... Greta
  (more)


Runtime: Sweden:180 min (2 parts) / Sweden:180 min
Country: Sweden
Language: Swedish / French
Color: Color
Sound Mix: Dolby Digital
Certification: Sweden:11

Trivia: The film was originally released 7 December 2005 on DVD, a month before it was scheduled to be shown on TV. When it was shown Swedish TV (SVT) it was in two parts, 90 minutes each, on 6th and 7th January 2006. (more)
